query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Beat It', contribute to the evolution of the music industry and set new standards for visual storytelling in music?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal techniques and her iconic performances influence the pop and R&B genres during her peak career years?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to reinvent his image and sound throughout the decades impact the landscape of rock music and inspire future artists?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's theatrical performance style and songwriting contribute to the legacy of Queen and shape the dynamics of live rock concerts?

query_5.text: How did Ariana Grande's approach to blending pop and R&B, along with her vocal range, redefine contemporary music trends for a new generation?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's music and activism promote the message of peace and unity, and how did it influence the global perception of reggae music?
